sources.title: Rough Shoot
sources.description: “Not so bad espionage yarn” “Almost like Hitchcock” “Act three is worth the wait” (IMDB reviews quotes). Joel McCrea is caught up in this entertaining British spy thriller with a solid Anglo-American cast and good production values. And yes, act three is definitely worth the wait. IMDB rating 6.1. Directed by Robert Parrish. Released in 1953. Complete print (UK TV rip). AKA “Shoot First” CAST NOTE: Patricia Laffan is probably best known for her role as Nyah the “Devil Girl from Mars.”
